P

Piece - Class in broker
This class represent an object of type Piece which will contain the necessary data for each piece that will be played by either player.
Piece() - Constructor for class broker.Piece
This constructs a piece with default values.
Piece(Piece) - Constructor for class broker.Piece
This constructs a player by creating a copy of another piece.
Piece(char) - Constructor for class broker.Piece
This constructs a player with a char.
pieceColourToString() - Method in class broker.Player
Returns the pieceColour's full name as a string.
playAnOtherRound() - Static method in class controller.PVEnvironment
Call this method to start a new round which creates a new game instance.
playAnotherRound() - Static method in class controller.PVPlayer
1) this method needs to increment round count 2) use the constructor that takes player objects but switch around p1 and p2 3) Set up the new board and have the maingui update the board 4) set up the new player stats panel and have the main gui update the player stats panel Note: use the methods already implemented to help you code this I was able to do it in 5 lines or so.
playAnOtherRoundFortextBasedApplication() - Static method in class controller.PVEnvironment
implementation of playAnOtherRound for text based applications.
playedBy() - Method in class broker.Square
Returns a reference of the Player object stored in this square.
Player - Class in broker
This class represents an object of type Player which will contain and maintain all the relevant player profile info, such as name, piece colour, and the number of wins, losses, and draws the player has.
Player(String, char) - Constructor for class broker.Player
Construct a player with a user name and piece colour, and set wins, losses, and draws to 0.
Player(Player) - Constructor for class broker.Player
Construct a copy of a player with the original player.
Player(Player, char) - Constructor for class broker.Player
Construct a copy of Player but swaps the piece colour to aid in swapping which player is player one.

playMove(int, int) - Static method in class controller.GameController
This method places a player's piece on a specified x,y-coordinate square.

PVEnvironment - Class in controller
This controller will be used for managing the Player versus environment mode.
PVEnvironment() - Constructor for class controller.PVEnvironment
 
PVPlayer - Class in controller
This controller class will set up the game with the players after they enter their user name and click on "start game" it will then relay the game setup to the gui.
PVPlayer() - Constructor for class controller.PVPlayer
